explains: n. 先见之明；（枪的）前准星；前视

sentences.en: They had the foresight to invest in new technology.
sentences.cn: 他们有投资新技术的先见之明。

sentences.en: She had had the foresight to prepare herself financially in case of an accident.
sentences.cn: 她有先见之明，经济上作了准备以防万一发生事故。

sentences.en: No one had enough foresight to predict the winner.
sentences.cn: 谁也没有足够的远见能预测哪一个获胜。
